name: Pop'n Taisen Puzzle Dama Online
description:
Pop'n Taisen Puzzle Dama Online is a block-building game. It is part of the Pop'n Music series and Taisen Puzzle-Dama series.

The gameplay is similar to the others Taisen Puzzle-Dama games, just the balls have been changed to Pop-kuns instead, in order to fit the Pop'n music theme. The game also uses an online feature to download and unlock content, such as secret characters and songs.

name: The Captcha Game
description:
Welcome to "The Captcha Game" – Where completing a verification is the game itself.
Don't worry, it'll only take a few seconds.
So... Are you a Human?

name: Deathloop + Ghostwire: Tokyo bundle
description: This Includes Deathloop + Ghostwire: Tokyo

name: Shi Kong Zhi Lun
description: Shi Kong Zhi Lun, also known as Chrono Trigger, is a Chinese unlicensed demake of Square's Chrono Trigger made by Shenzhen Nanjing Technology. It makes use of the same engine as Shenzhen's other RPGs, though it attempts to incorporate the active battle system of the original game. Much content was cut to fit what could be fit onto the cartridge, and the game still does not continue past the battle with Magus, who is nearly impossible to defeat.

name: Merge Fellas
description: Merge memes in this puzzle game! Combine meme pets to make them bigger! Be the first to create a giant capybara! Solve the puzzle and merge all the pets!

name: City 7: Toronto Conflict
description: City 7: Toronto Conflict, is an action packed Half-Life 2 mod with a variety of unique levels and game play. Explore what has become of City 7 in areas like Dundas square, Eaton Center , Mel Lastman square, St. Michael's Hospital and TTC system under the Combine rule. This version features Gordon Freeman as the main character, stuck in Toronto due to a teleporting accident in Kleiner's lab. Try to escape this war torn city by finding any type of teleporting technology and send him back to City 17.

name: Quiet Rehabilitation
description: Quiet Rehabilitation is a FREE Half-Life 2 single-player modification that tells a different story of Gordon Freeman being taken prisoner directly to Nova Prospekt. In this alternate route, without meeting Barney, he must find a way to escape from this old facility heavily guarded by Combine forces and surrounded by unusual creatures.

name: Galactic Foodtruck Simulator 2999
description: Submission to the DOS Games End of Year Jam 2023 on Itch.io. The year is 2999. The galaxy hungers. You heard their cries and you bought the foodtruck. Now you have 40 weeks to establish a thriving mobile restaurant business and begin paying back your creditors, or have your mind erased by the dreaded Repos.

name: Penetration
description: The mod story does not consider events in Half-Life 2:Episode 1. After explosion of citadel, G-man immerses Gordon Freeman in stasis, but after a while deduces it from there for the new mission. The target of this mission is penetration into a citadel which is in City 18 (the city located near to City 17). In this citadel there is a teleport in Combine world. Using this teleport, it is necessary to get in Combine World and to destroy their leader.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner - Soul Hackers
description: A remake of the PlayStation and Sega Saturn game of the same name. New features include full voice acting, 30 new demons, and the ability to use play coins to make Nemechi stronger.

name: Mega Man
description: A J2ME port of Mega Man.

name: Plus City
description:
Plus City is a mobile game where you can build your own city. Quests, interesting games and Easter eggs await you inside!

Develop the City, find references to popular films and tracks and invite new residents. Play match three and other mini-games and puzzles to earn coins, complete quests and build new houses: Card Workshop, Popsicle Stick Factory and other story objects - try to open them all!

Increase the levels of services in the game. For example, open a Taxi House and get more rewards for trips.

developers.name: Direct Cursus Computer Systems Trading LLC

name: 2048 10x10
description: Swipe and merge the tiles until you reach the 2048th tile, however this time in a 10x10 grid.

name: To Altare
description: A small platformer fan game where you bounce your way up to find Altare.

name: Carl the Caveman
description: In this arcade game you have to help a caveman find all the mushrooms and collect all the jewels in the maze. This needs to be done as carefully as possible - some levels are inhabited by both monsters and poisonous toadstools, who themselves are not averse to trying to eat a gaping mushroom picker.

name: Poppy It! Playtime
description: Complete all the Poppy Pop It toys to escape from the factory! Do them all before the time limit.

name: Carl the Caveman: Christmas Adventures
description:
Every year on Christmas Eve, Santa Claus leaves his house with gifts addressed to all children. But a great misfortune happened: the snowman decided to ruin the holiday and stole every single gift! And to make it more difficult to find them, he scattered them across ice caves and snow-covered rocks.

Now saving the holiday depends only on you. You will control a smiling and cute troglodyte, hit the road and collect all the scattered gifts of Santa Claus. But be extremely careful! You can crash on sharp ice, get caught in a stone bag and a bunch of other troubles.

name: Night Cafe
description: Educational CD-ROM game for Windows 3.1/95 and Macintosh.

name: Gakkyu Ou Yamazaki
description: Gakkyu Ou Yamazaki is a Role-Playing game, published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Gakuen Battle Fishers: Yoky Shiimono wa Tsure
description: Gakuen Battle Fishers: Yoky Shiimono wa Tsure is a Sports game, developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Nagoya and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: To Die in the Shade
description: A gothic romance visual novel retelling of The Beauty and the Beast.

name: Command & Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Truck Driver: The American Dream - Freedom to Roam
description:
Unload your cargo and soak in breathtaking panoramic vistas with the new Freedom-to-Roam mode. This feature offers the perfect escape for those seeking a more laidback truck driving experience, providing an unstructured way of playing Truck Driver: The American Dream.

With the Freedom-to-Roam update, players will have access to new job opportunities they can take on whenever they like, gaining experience and advancing in the trucking world on their own terms. Every town, city, gas station, and rest stop will present randomly generated missions of varying difficulties, sending players to deliver cargo across the map.

name: Gotham Knights: Heroic Assault
description: Heroic Assault is a gameplay mode that is separate from the main story campaign. The standalone mode supports up to four players in online co-op and provides a dedicated arena-like environment with specific objectives to complete and enemies to defeat on each floor (30 floors total).

name: Deep Vault 69
description: Might I say, you're looking fit as a fiddle! And this is not surprising, because you are one of the survivors in a comfortable vault! But it's time to get to the surface to explore the world. Well, or try to do it!

name: Army of Tactics
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey through the world of Army of Tactics, where strategy and fortune blend into the best mobile game experience. Free to download and thrilling to play, your saga begins on mystical islands, with every battle a step towards glory!

name: Shep Hard
description: Keep your flock safe in this extreme shepherding game. Your goal is to raise 10 platinum sheep. You'll need to grow your plot, smack away wolves, shear your sheep, and eventually lay down mortar towers and turrets to get it done in this insane blend of Tower Defense and King of the Hill.

name: Dead Drop
description:
Dead Drop is the 19th game in the Carol Reed series.

The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
There is absolutely no need to have played any of the previous games in the Carol Reed series to fully enjoy Dead Drop.

The game takes place is Sweden, but it is in English. All dialogues have subtitles.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.

name: Rage: Anger Management
description: The Realm of Rage was a secret place, hidden from the eyes of mortals and gods alike. It was created by an ancient wizard, whose name was lost to time, as a sanctuary for himself and his fellow adventures. There, they could unleash their anger and frustration on anything they desired, without fear of consequences or death.

name: Body of Work
description:
A short interactive fiction game about the opening night of an art gallery.

CW: Descriptions of gore, body horror, & light sexuality.

name: The Game Maker
description:
The Game Maker is the 18th game in the Carol Reed series.

The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
There is absolutely no need to have played any of the previous games in the Carol Reed series to fully enjoy The Game Maker.

The game takes place is Sweden, but it is in English. All dialogues have subtitles.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.

name: ZombieSmash HD
description: ZombieSmash HD is a survival comedy game, featuring undead-themed castle defense and entertaining, physics-based gameplay. The game casts players as Joey, a lone survivor pit against a herd of writhing, unrelenting zombies. To defeat the undead masses, players must use their fingers to flick and smash them until they’re un-undead.

name: Goddess of Fate IV: Lilith
description: Lilith, who is the Dark Goddess of Fate, has come to the planet at the Doomsday! Build your army of beauties to protect your homeland!

name: Idle Pirate Legend
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Magic School
description: Ever wanted to build and manage a magic academy? Expand your school and upgrade classes. Enroll new students and watch them graduate. Expand, automate and boost school construction with magic coins! Keep an eye out for the ingredients that can brew potions and aid your journey. As you step outside and explore the magic world, the map will reveal details of school, such as dormitories, magic alley and classrooms.

name: Gacha World
description:
Welcome to the Gacha World
Create your own anime styled Gacha Summoner, and Gacha the best 5-7's easily! Get gems by farming quests, battling Raid Bosses, PvP, and many more ways! Save the world from corruption as you learn every character's story. Get your gacha on and enter the Gacha World!

name: Gambler Densetsu Tetsuya: Shinjuku Tenun-hen
description: Gambler Densetsu is a Miscellaneous game, published by Athena, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Game Conveni 21
description: Game Conveni 21 is a Strategy game, published by Starfish, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: GB Harobots
description: GB Harobots is a Role-Playing game, published by Sunrise Interactive, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Xuxa
description: Sin descripción

name: Gensoumaden Saiyuuki: Sabaku no Shikami
description: Gensoumaden Saiyuuki: Sabaku no Shikami is a Role-Playing game, published by J-Wing, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Gessou! Dangun Racer Onsoku Buster: Dangun Tama
description: Gessou! Dangun Racer Onsoku Buster: Dangun Tama is a Racing game, published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Wizard's Beard
description: Explore enemy-infested areas to find items and loot, or kill enemies and take their stuff! Go through strange doors, fight new enemies, defeat powerful bosses, gain unique abilities, and find strong items, all while trying to not die. There are several different routes you can go through, with actions in game and choices in dialogue all affecting different elements throughout the game. Some of which you might not even notice until the end.. Have fun finding all the endings!

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: The Alucard Moveset
description: A mod which adds Alucard as a playable character to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, with a moveset based on Castlevania: Symphony of the Night.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Ninten Moveset
description: A mod which adds Ninten to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, along with his moves from EarthBound Beginnings.

name: On Christmas He Will Return Home
description:
An experimental visual novel about abusive relationships (with prophetic destiny.)

A woman awaits for her love to return on Christmas.

With every day, his return becomes more inevitable.

name: Rat Wars Survivors
description: Rat Wars Survivors was released by industrial noise band Health to promote their sixth album, Rat Wars. It is an homage to Vampire Survivors.

name: Shikigami No Shiro Evolution
description: Shikigami No Shiro Evolution for Xbox is an update of the original version of Shikigami No Shiro which was released in March 2002. The new version has an improved AI, new characters, and new game modes not found in the original. Available as 2 versions (blue & red cover).

name: Il Grande Gioco di Tangentopoli
description: Il Grande Gioco di Tangentopoli is an Italian game based on the "Mani Pulite" political scandal. It features two types of levels: the first involves shooting at various passing politicians, while the second requires recovering paperwork.

name: Origami Solutions
description: In "Origami Solutions," every choice folds a new path in the clandestine world of power, loyalty, and family ties. Uncover the secrets, confront the dilemmas, and shape the fate of Adam.

name: Project 13
description:
Welcome to Project 13, a unique Walking Simulator that challenges your perception and instincts in a dystopian world. In this immersive experience, you step into the shoes of a disposable Probant, devoid of rights and a future, tasked with navigating a mysterious, repeating Hospital Corridor.

Your objective is clear: report any anomalies encountered during your walks. The catch? A single mistake means starting anew. Only by consistently reporting accurately can you progress through the enigmatic corridors.

name: Five Nights at Haunted House
description: Can you survive five nights in haunted place where your mission is to save yourself by evils ghost and mummy? Then be ready and select the best player of your own choice and start your mission. Enter in our haunted survival manor house and get ready for the mysterious quest!

name: U C U B E
description: Sin descripción

name: Galaga: Destination Earth
description: The Game Boy Color Port of "Galaga: Destination Earth" is an Action game, developed by Pipe Dream Interactive and published by Hasbro Interactive, which was released in 2000.

name: Monkey-catching Game
description: Is Monkey cheating on Banana? Investigate and take pictures to find out.

name: Pokémon: Abstract Version
description:
Pokémon: Abstract Version is a fanmade game using rpgmaker that features a fully open world region with:
- 11 Settlements
- 28 Wild Areas
- 4 Provinces (Tranquill, Strife, Carnage, and Vigor)
- Gyms/Story Events that can be done in any order
- 18 New Pokémon
- 8 New Megas
- New tiles
- Fully Custom UI
- Level scaling
- Difficulty modes
- HM Items that open up new areas
- A full story

name: Deep Space Waifu: DLC
description: Academy themed DLC for the first Deep Space Waifu game, containing new levels.

name: ZX Spectrum Pac-Man Arcade
description:
This is a faithful conversion of the original Pac-Man arcade for the ZX Spectrum 48K. Everything was recreated with as much detail as possible through hours of reading of multiple Pac-Man guides and playing the original game. Being a conversion, some concessions were made to work around the limitations of the 48K but the overall result is still pretty close. The game runs at a silky smooth 50fps with game sound and no tearing or flickering.

All the level progression, logic, rules and timings are implemented exactly like the arcade. All the intermissions are included at the end of the right levels. All the ghost logic was replicated exactly as the original. A fix has been made to Inky's logic which had a bug in the original. Game does not "crash" like the original arcade at the end of level 256. It simply ends with a Game Over. It also supports a 2 Players game like the arcade.

name: The Day of Sagittarius III
description: The Day of Sagittarius III is a strategy shooter game in space based on the fictional one featured in Haruhi Suzumiya. In this version, the player has to complete missions by destroying enemies using five fleets.

name: The Idolmaster
description: The Idolmaster is a popular Japanese rhythm and simulation game that focuses on the management and training of virtual pop idols. Developed by Namco (later Bandai Namco Entertainment), the game places players in the role of a producer working with a talent agency to nurture and guide aspiring idols towards stardom, and the first title in the 1st Vision era.

name: Domino!
description: Competitive domino game with options to play vs. a computer, a random opponent, or a friend. Comes with three game types (draw, block, fives) and built-in social features, like profiles and chat.

name: Night Runners
description:
Night-Runners is a PC street racing game heavily influenced by 1990s-2009 car culture, with some RPG elements.

The game has semi realistic Simcade driving style. oil temp/water temp etc matter if you're planning on using NOS and don't want to blow your engine!

name: Freakhunter
description: First person 640x480 resolution throwback dungeon crawler.

name: Double Dragon
description: The Commodore port of Double Dragon.

description: The Commodore port of Double Dragon.

description: The Sega Master System port of Double Dragon.

description: The Amstrad CPC port of Double Dragon.

description: The MS-DOS port of Double Dragon.

name: Double Dragon
description: The MSX port of Double Dragon.

name: Double Dragon
description: The Sega Mega Drive/Genesis port of Double Dragon.

name: Robocop vs. Predator
description:
Robocop is involved in an awesome adventure against Predator, but the terrible alien is not the only problem that he'll face. More troubles from the future are coming, but some friends also, to fight this final war and save the future of the human race!

This game is a lovely tribute to the cult movies of 80s and 90s. If you loved them as my team, you'll like this little gem we made for you.

name: Fourville
description:
On the day of the Great War, the residents of Salem made their way to the shelter of Vault 4. Only those registered in the vault programme were granted entrance. Some refugees reasoned that if they could wait out the twenty-year closure period, which Vault-Tec had advertised, then they would be able to find shelter when the vault opened.

More than two-hundred years later the town had changed a lot. A town grew up inside the cave outside the vault, its houses made from reclaimed Vault-Tec equipment and built into the walls of the cave which have been dug out as generations of residents tried to get inside the vault.

When the Sole Survivor arrives at Fourville the town is in the middle of an election where the vault has become a major point of contention. The town's incumbent mayor believes the vault will open one day, and has made this the focal point of his campaign. His challenger believes the vault is holding the town back and attempts to get inside should be abandoned. The Sole Survivor's involvement can shift the scale and change the face of the community forever.

name: Maxwell's World
description:
Located just a few miles from Boston, Maxwell’s World was once a place of joy. The biggest amusement park in the country, Mister Maxwell dedicated his fortunes and life to making everyone’s time at Maxwell’s World as happy as possible. Then the bombs fell and it all went to shit.

Now, the park lies open, shrouded in legend and danger. A thousand myths say that Maxwell hid a treasure, deep inside the control center of the park, just waiting to be reclaimed by some wasteland.

Unfortunately, a thousand more myths say that something happened to Maxwell’s World. They tell tales of shambling skeletons in the park that attack anything in sight, robots that find you and force-feed you hot dogs, of the rides coming to life and devouring those inside. There are some that say that Maxwell traded his soul to keep the park running, and not even the apocalypse stopped that.

All anyone knows, is that whoever enters Maxwell’s World, never leaves. Because the park isn’t just open. It’s alive.

name: Goraku-Ou Tango!
description: Goraku Ou Tango! is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Mebius, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Infinite Labyrinth
description: A rouge-lite video game created for the TSA 2021 State Competition in which you explore a randomly generated dungeon.

name: Hentai Girls: Contact
description: The popular hentai puzzle franchise has reached a new level, now with visual novel elements! More than 20 naked pictures of AAA quality, various mechanics, female moans, three difficulty levels, gallery, 100 achievements, relaxing music and beautiful graphics

name: Double Dragon II: The Revenge
description: The PC Engine CD version of Double Dragon II by Naxat Soft is surprisingly modeled closely after the NES game, from featuring mostly the same levels down to the rule of having no more than two enemies on screen at a time. But it does mix and match different types together, and in general extends the stages with additional hoodlums. There are a few other notable structural differences – namely, the fight on the huge moving bulldozer at the end of the forest level is missing, but to make up for its omission, the Lee brothers actually have to fight Willy before they meet their own shadows like in the arcade game. They also get to face the Shadow Master (now without the cape) on any difficulty level, although you miss out on the second round in a church and the good ending with Marion revived unless you beat the game on the Hard difficulty mode.

name: Smol Snek
description:
Can you feed the hungry snek and avoid corruption?

smol snek is a small snake game for the Atari 8bit computers. Your playing style affects the chance for snek to get corrupted by food.

Earn bonus score by picking up food guaranteed to not corrupt snek. Corruption can spawn bad food, grow snek, make the play field shake or melt in with the background.

Avoid corruption long enough to unlock the secret level!

The game has been tested on a PAL Atari 600XL expanded to 64K, and an PAL Atari 130XE. The game should work fine on NTSC machines, and the snek speed is adapted to be the same on both variants to make high score table fair.

name: Santa Run
description:
Santa Run is a free Christmas game that was created in seven days for all Commodore Amiga fans.

Control Santa as you leap from roof to roof and deliver presents down the chimneys.

Santa Run is a score based game, if you reach the end of the street you will have completed the game. A nice greeting awaits at the end of the game.

name: Skiddy
description:
A Commodore 64 game for the 2022 Reset64 4k 'Craptastic' games competition.

For 1 or 2 players.

Beat the competition in 5, 10 or 20-lap races of the track in cars with bald tyres.

For joystick only - plug into port 1 to drive the yellow car and port 2 to drive the blue car.

Hold fire to accelerate and release fire to brake. Move the joystick left or right to steer your car. Sprint to the finish and set a lap record; beat your friends or the latest in self-driving autopilot software.

Skiddy was designed for PAL Commodore 64s but is also NTSC compatible.

name: Cheesy Trials
description:
A devilish platform game for the 24K expanded Vic 20.

There are three experiments to complete, select one to play using the function keys (F1, F3, F5) or the action buttons on TheVic20's 'TheJoystick'. Can press these keys / buttons at any time to switch experiments without losing your progress.

The experiment main rooms reveal doorways to the trial rooms. Initially in each experiment you will see just the first trial room. Complete it to reveal more,

Control Echo the Mouse with a joystick and learn his abilities as you go. Hint, it is best to start with Experiment 1.

To beat a trial room collect a piece of cheese before the time runs out. You only have 5 seconds to do this between each cheese and more of the room is revealed. Sometimes there will be more than one cheese and your choice can drastically affect the room.

You have infinite clones but must be successful to proceed. If a trial room in one experiment is proving to be too challenging, jump over to one of the other experiments instead.

Complete the trials in all three experiments to win Echo's freedom.

name: Freeze64 Christmas Game
description: It is a FREEZE-ing Chrismas Eve and Santa has presents to deliver. See how many parcels you can drop into chimneys before the moon sets, but watch out for Chinese lanterns, bats and burglars who are on the prowl to try to spoil Christmas!

name: Ninja Gardening Simulator
description:
Ninjas attack in groups of 12, with each group using a different climbing style. Defeat four groups and they'll get faster and you'll score more points.

If six ninjas manage to get in, they'll destroy part of the building and you'll take on that group again but a slower speed.

The game ends when the ninjas have damaged the building six times.

Good luck ninja!

name: ZXombies!
description:
It's 1983 and the dead are rising from the grave. Who can save us?

You play Magenta, the 100% badass zombie slayer. As the sole survivor of her family, Magenta is on a mission to rid the earth of undead scum. Looking cool while she does it is a bonus too.

Traveling tirelessly from market town to village, she trawls the graveyards for sport collecting trophies from the wretched prey. How much can she collect before the dead overwhelm her?

name: Yet Another Krappy Shooter
description: An endless horizontal shooter with increasing difficulty for ZX Spectrum 16k

name: Pilot Attack
description: Horizontally scrolling shooter for Sinclair ZX Spectrum 48k home computer

name: Money Mouse in Full Barn House
description:
Money Mouse in Full Barn House is a classic maze / collect-'em-up inspired by the game "Byte Bitten", one of my favourite budget titles from the 1980's.

Money Mouse just wants to spend time playing his favourite games, but family and friends keep getting in the way. "Where's my thingamybob?" they ask? "Have you seen my whatchamacalledit?"

Money won't get any fun until they're satisfied. Find their objects and return them within the time limit to get access to the arcade and play games. But you know the moment the game ends, someone is going to want something else...

name: Carrot Clicker
description: Carrot Clicker is an incremental clicker game about farming carrots.

name: Guru-guru Garacters
description: GuruGuru Garacters is a Role-Playing game, developed by Multimedia Intelligence Transfer and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Guru-guru Town Hanamaru-kun
description: GBC version of the picture book "Hanamaru-kun" for young children. Educational software that allows you to learn the knowledge you need in your daily life through games such as errands, hideouts, and shiritori. You can enjoy the story as if you were watching a TV program, and you can study without knowing it.

name: Gute Zeiten Schlechte Zeiten Quiz
description: Gute Zeiten Schlechte Zeiten Quiz is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Software 2000, which was released in Europe in 2000.

name: Gyouten Ningen Batseelor: Doctor Guy no Yabou
description: Gyouten Ningen Batseelor: Doctor Guy no Yabou is a Role-Playing game, published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Hamster Club: Awasete Chu
description: A puzzle game. Work with the cute hamsters to get rid of the falling blocks. There are two modes: "single mode" where you can see the ending according to the score when you select a support character and increase the score, and "2P battle mode" where you lose if the blocks are piled up first. The first privilege is an original key chain gift.

name: Hamster Club: Oshiema Chu
description: The fifth in the "Hamster Club" series. Aim for Dr. Hamster with quizzes and variety shows! Questions about various things about hamsters in a quiz format. You can get a mini-game by answering correctly and leveling up (1 to 6 steps). In addition, you can get rewards (24 kinds of 4-frame animation in total) by scoring the mini game! !! In "Hamster Shindan", you can diagnose which hamster character you own is close to which hamster character in "Hamster Club".

name: Hamster Club 2
description: The second hamster breeding simulation game. In addition to the familiar "Shigecchi", cute new characters are appearing one after another. A new mini-game has been added to the new story, and it is full of fun and cuteness. Comes with a mascot doll as a first-time limited benefit.

name: Hamster Paradise 2
description: Give the hamster you got a cute name. Basically care! If you grow up lovingly, your hamster will grow bigger and bigger. Grow carefully by feeding and taking a walk. If you take a walk with your hamster, there will be many events. You can get money by clearing the mini game. Use this money to buy food, toys, and birdhouses for your hamster. Hamsters can get married when they grow up. If you grow your hamster well, new species may be born.

name: Hamster Paradise 3
description: In this game, you can grow your favorite kind of hamster from Golden Hamster, Jungarian, and Roborovski. In addition to the mini rabbit that was popular in the previous work, a squirrel also appeared. There are also plenty of fun mini games to play with hamsters. In addition to familiar games such as ham wheels and ham catches, new games have been added, and there are more than dozens of them. The cage is also transformed into a two-story building. You can enjoy playing around by going up and down. Not only parks and shops, but also amusement parks and schools, where you can go out with hamsters has increased. You can now collect stickers that you can get at various places in the game, and exchange emails with your friends via infrared communication.

name: Hamster Paradise 4
description: The types of hamsters that can be raised have increased to eight types: Golden, Jungarian, Roborovski, Blue Sapphire, White, Black, Panda, and Pudding! In addition, it has become possible to keep two hamsters at the same time. When you feed them, you can see cute gestures that the two animals share and eat. You can marry your own hamsters or play with your friend's hamsters using the communication function. The contents of the mini-game have been renewed, new walking places have been added, 16 new types of hamsters can be discovered, and you can meet the discovered hamsters at "Maison de Hamster".

name: The Mummy
description:
The Mummy is an action game with puzzle elements based on the movie of the same name. The plot basically centers on an Egyptian priest who was mummified in his time and later resurrected in 1926. Now he threatens to destroy the world.

It concentrates on exploring tombs and getting the artifacts inside. In most of the 46 levels, the player has access to three protagonists with different abilities: Evelyn can transport items and jump high, Rick can shoot with his pistols to kill enemies or use a sniper rifle to hit far away switches and Jonathan can use explosives. Each of the characters has their own life bars and the player can switch instantly between them. It is necessary to put all three characters to good use to solve the puzzles and platforming challenges the game offer. It is possible to bring a level to an unwinnable state, but there is a function to reset the level without penalty.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 27
description: A new rotation strategy after careful consideration of player feedback regarding our map rotation system. Rotations will now vary between map selection and random map regions.

name: The VHS Paradise
description: You are Robert, the cashier from The VHS Paradise. Your job is to serve customers on the night shift, but be careful! There is a lot of crime in the city and all kinds of crazy people on the loose.

name: Outback Joey
description: Outback Joey is a fitness focused platform game, specifically designed for the Sega Genesis' HeartBeat Catalyst accessory. Joey, the main character, navigates through four distinct levels. He utilizes his jumping ability to combat enemies with kicks and dodge obstacles. At specific points within the game, Joey has the opportunity to obtain boxing gloves, enhancing his ability to vanquish foes.

name: Klondike
description: Klondike, a solitaire game, was released via the Sega Channel service in North America and was designed by the renowned programmer David Crane.

name: Circuit USA
description: A port of Kyle Petty's No Fear Racing, with the difference being the removal of the references of the celebrity.

name: The Darkness
description: An upcoming remaster/port of the Darkness (2007) video game, confirmed by Stephen Kick, the CEO of Nightdive Studios.

name: Deep State
description: Deep State, a first person shooter inspired by classic games such as Goldeneye 007, Deus Ex, and Resident Evil.

name: Judgment
description: A remastered version of Judgment, featuring faster loading times, 60 FPS, as well as all of the downloadable content from the original release.

name: Gotham Knights: Heroic Assault: The Kelvin Incident
description: The Kelvin Incident is a new Heroic Assault adding a 15-floor raid , Mythic gear, a new suit transmog, 4 new batcycle transmogs, and new stronger enemies.

name: Reunion
description: It's been 3 years since the loss of your Parents. Now you've got out of the Orphanage and you want to find your missing Brother, which might still be alive somewhere.

name: Doom Eternal: The Ancient Gods - Expansion Pass
description:
You pulled humanity back from the edge of extinction, but it came at a cost, leaving an imbalance of power in the cosmos that threatens all of creation. The soul of the universe hangs in the balance.

The Ancient Gods Expansion Pass includes both campaign expansions for the critically acclaimed DOOM Eternal.

The Ancient Gods - Part One
The legions of Hell have razed the heavens, threatening to expand across dimensions. Battle your way back to Urdak and decide the fate of the cosmos. Your mission is now your own.

The Ancient Gods - Part Two
Defy the gods and awaken an ancient evil in the epic conclusions to the DOOM Slayer’s saga. Rally the scattered Sentinel armies, lay siege to the last bastion of Hell, break through the fortress walls and face the Dark Lord himself.

name: Hissatsu Pachinko Boy CR Monster House
description: The model includes the super popular "CR Monster House". Not only the LCD screen of the actual machine, but also the movement of the pachinko ball is realistically reproduced! There are 3 modes in total. In the "capture mode", you can set the cash rate and simulate the play at a pachinko parlor while checking the balance status, rotation speed, number of jackpots, number of reach, etc. "Tamare mode" is a mode that allows you to start digitally at any time. You can change the jackpot probability and enjoy the digital movement of the LCD screen. In the "Reach Catalog", you can see all the reach patterns of Monster House at any time.

name: Honkaku Hanafuda GB
description: The content of the game includes 3 competitions, "Koikoi", "Oicho Kabu", and "Flower Matching". A gem of thinking that even Hanafuda enthusiasts will groan, such as abundant option settings and formidable opponents with full-scale thinking. "Winning mode" and "Free battle mode" are available. In "Winning Mode", 7 characters appear as opponents, and the competition can be played in the order of "Koikoi", "Flower Matching", and "Oicho Kabu", and the strength of the rivals will increase as they win. "Free battle mode" is ideal for training, as you can freely select your favorite competition and character.

name: Ongeki Bright Memory
description: Expanded version of the previous entry in Sega's arcade rhythm gacha series.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Sublime Spring
description:
Version 3.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Azure Empyrea (Fu Hua)
• New ELF: Book of Fuxi
• New Featured Event: Empyrean Legends
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Ninja's Noir
description:
Version 3.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the 'A Shooting Star Streaking Across the Night' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Darkbolt Jonin (Yae Sakura)
• New Story Chapter XIV: Dispel the Darkness
• New Animated Short: Meteoric Salvation
• New Featured Event: Sanka Saga
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Stygian Nymph
description:
Version 3.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the 'A Shooting Star Streaking Across the Night' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Hawk of the Fog (Fu Hua) & Stygian Nymph (Seele)
• New Story Chapter XIII: ARC Nocturne
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Edict of Twilight
description:
Version 3.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the 'From the Deep Ocean' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Twilight Paladin (Theresa)
• New Story Chapter XII: Plain of Vigrid
• New Animated Short: Seele
• Level Cap Increase to 85
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Cyberangel
description:
Version 3.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Herrscher of Reason (Bronya) & Void Drifter (Kiana)
• New Story Chapter XI-EX: Void Heavens & Diane's Sojourn
• New Featured Event: Odd Drifter
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Undine's Phantasm
description:
Version 3.2 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Swallowtail Phantasm (Seele)
• New ELF: Selune's Elegy
• New Story Chapter XI: Deep End of the Sea
• New Animated Short: Cyberangel: ZERO Exception
• New Featured Event: Summer Imaginary Maze
• ...and more!

name: Hate Me Not
description:
A roguelike twin-stick shooter, where you defend the same thing that tries to hurt you.
Venture into the side of darkness to defeat enemies before they reach the Yin-Yang.
Switch to the side of light to gather ammo and upgrades, before the time runs out and the next wave of monsters spawn.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Dreams of Gemina
description:
Version 3.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Blueberry Blitz (Liliya), Molotov Cherry (Rozaliya) & Drive Kometa (Bronya)
• New Chronicles: Dreams of Gemina
• New Featured Event: Honkai Kingdoms
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Deep Enigma
description:
Version 3.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the 'From the Deep Ocean' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Argent Knight: Artemis (Rita), Phantom Iron (Rita) & Striker Fulminata (Mei)
• New ELF System with 2 ELFs: Jingwei's Wings & Blood Embrace
• New Story Chapter IX-EX 2: Dark Serpent
• New Story Chapter X: Under the Deep
• New Team Raid: Eye of the Deep
• Level Cap Increase to 82
• ...and more!

name: My Love for You is Evermore: Manager's Route
description: DLC for Manager's route that includes twelve chapters and five new CGs.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Anniversary Rave
description:
Version 2.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Umbral Rose (Rita) & Vermilion Knight: Eclipse (Himeko)
• New Story Chapter IX: Journey for Tomorrow
• New Animated Short: Final Lesson
• New Featured Event: Fairytale Rhapsody
• ...and more!

name: Feudalism III
description: Five factions at the continent are fighting each other in a bloody war. Each one have its strengts and weaknesses, but who will win this battle? Who will you join to capture the whole world?

name: Itsudemo Pachinko GB: CR Monster House
description: The super popular pachinko machine "CR Monster House" is now available on GB! Faithfully reproduce from the movement of the ball to the reach action and the pattern of the jackpot. There are two modes in the game, "Story mode" where you play against monster characters such as the familiar witch Franken with quotas, and "Play mode" where you can find a strategy according to the platform, and the position and inclination of the nails are highlighted. There is also a function that you can check. It also has a backup function that allows you to save your money and progress, so you can easily play games while you are on the move or in a little spare time. This is the only way to play pachinko in GB!

name: Jagainu-kun
description: "Jagainu-kun" is a music picture book game (a heartwarming dance that enhances the sense of rhythm). Choose story mode when playing for the first time. As the story goes on, the dance begins with a certain trigger. There are choices in the middle of the story, and the dance songs and the characters you meet will change depending on how you proceed. At first, the purpose is to select various routes and collect characters and dances. When you finish the story, the result will be reflected and you can make your own picture book, you can read it in "picture book mode", and you can also enjoy dancing with the songs and characters collected on the way. Unlike traditional music games, there are no commands, so it's simple, easy to remember, and easy to get used to.

name: Jankyuusei: Cosplay Paradise
description: The main character is Tsumorou, a Gutara university student who is scheduled to graduate next spring. The major is the teacher's egg in the teaching process. The time for practical training is finally approaching for the protagonist who has been a student. However, I wanted to practice teaching differently from others, so I decided to go to two schools and do each for a week. How can we make this training fruitful ... So the hero wondered. I wanted to make a club by making the best use of mahjong, which I am good at, and build a relationship of trust with the students. If you can't get the trust in your area of ​​expertise, then the hero isn't a teacher. Will there be a demon or a snake? Okite-breaking educational training is about to begin! A dream mahjong battle with 12 characters, straddling the two worlds of the two major elf titles, "Classmate" and "Lower Classmate"! There are two game modes, a "free match mode" where you can enjoy mahjong in earnest with two or four players, and a "story mode" where you can make the other girl cosplay in various ways if you win the game. The cosplay screen scrolls all over! You can see the girl's slightly embarrassing facial expressions and gestures. If you clear "Story Mode", you can proceed to "Interleague Play" where you play mahjong with the characters of the two schools. Cosplay that cannot be seen in story mode is added.

name: A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing
description: A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing is a murder-mystery visual novel that takes place in a French high school. You play as Mercredi, an aloof teenage girl who finds that her life is quickly and continuously going awry when your friend goes missing.

name: Give Up Robot 2
description: This sequel takes the jumping, grappling and swinging insanity of the original and adds jetpacks, conveyor belts, electrified blocks, lasers, rockets, moving blocks, bosses and more. You will have to have patience and perseverance to make it through the 60 levels in Normal mode and the punishing 12 additional levels in Hard mode. Good luck, and don't give up.

name: Janosch: Das grosse Panama-Spiel
description: Sin descripción

name: Jet de Go!: Let's Go By Airliner
description: "JET de GO!", Which was popular in PS, is now available as GBC exclusive software. You can easily enjoy the actual aviation operations from takeoff, landing, and cruising. Weather changes such as rain and snow, and flights in the evening and midnight are also beautifully reproduced. Of course, you can take off and land at real airports (New Chitose Airport, Tokyo International Airport, Komatsu Airport, Nagoya Airport, Kansai International Airport, Matsuyama Airport, Hiroshima West Airport, Fukuoka Airport, Naha Airport) through the actual route. .. The initial appearances are three models, "J-31", "B767-300", and "B747-400D". As the game progresses, the aircraft becomes available.

name: Jissen Yakudatsu Tsumego
description: A puzzle game where players solve life and death go problems. It is solely go puzzles, there is no AI or board game aspect to it.

name: My Grandparent's House
description: My Grandparent's House is a first-person survival horror experience where you must play as a ten year old boy exploring a horrifying house and unraveling the mystery that lies within. Every game intends to be unique, as puzzle solutions, item placement and a part of the house are randomized. Unlock ten story-driven documents and six unique endings.

name: K.O.: The Pro Boxing
description: Supervised by JBC (Japan Boxing Association). The boxing life is beautifully reproduced in the game. Steady practice is a training simulation, and the game is a real-time action that actually operates the trained boxer. You can create and select your favorite boxer, and there are countless boxer creation patterns such as height, class, and face. It's up to the player to take advantage of their abilities and to train to reinforce their weaknesses. Not only the basic movements of boxing, but also the special moves unique to the game are hidden.

name: Kaitei Taisensou!! Treasure World
description: An adventure game where you travel around the world to find your friends and legendary treasures. You can enjoy the real thrill of the eternal theme "Treasure Hunt" that everyone is interested in. In order to break the seal of the ancient civilization, the main character becomes a treasure hunter looking for the ancient civilization that has sunk to the seabed due to crustal movement, and with the hint of the treasure called Great Treasure that sleeps in the seas around the world, the legendary treasure World Treasure Go on a voyage to look for it. Make full use of various items such as a variety of mini games and submarines to raise treasure.

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.5.0
description: An update to Smash Remix which adds new characters, namely Ebisumaru from the Goemon series, Banjo & Kazooie and even Dragon King, from Dragon King: The Fighting Game, a cancelled game which became Super Smash Bros, along with many new features like modes, options, stages and items.

name: Sonic CD: Miracle Edition
description:
As the earliest remastered of the classic Sonic Titles, Sonic CD has fewer changes and features compared to later remasters and Origins.

The purpose of this mod is to bring Sonic CD more in-line with the later remasters/Origins by adding several new features/options originally available in other mods.

name: Kanji Boy 3
description: The third installment of "Kanji BOY" that makes you smarter while playing games. The number of questions recorded is over 7,000! As you play, you will naturally acquire kanji. There are two game modes. There is a "existing question collection mode" where you can play the exams from the 2nd to 10th grades that have been asked in the past, and a "mini game mode" where you can get idioms about your body, health, animals, and living.

name: Kanji de Puzzle
description: You can enjoy the world of puzzle game magazines published in various ways on GB. Most of the kanji to be asked are 1006 kanji learned in the 1st to 6th grades of elementary school. Acquire perfect while playing antonyms, synonyms, stroke order, okurigana, homophones and idioms. There are four types of games: Kanji quiz "Spartan Z", Kanji crossword "Kankuro", "Kanji puzzle", and original puzzle "Elephant Dragon". It can also be used as a kanji learning tool for children from general education.

name: Ground Zero Hero
description: Wacky action-roguelite survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. The prologue covers the first full wasteland of the upcoming Ground Zero Hero.

name: At Night
description: At Night is a basic horror game about dodging a monster while trying to get to the safe room. Solve puzzles, close windows, lock doors, and run!

name: Angry Anna: Christmas Quest
description: You're Angry Anna, the most angriest girl of the world who's having now a very bad christmas and you decided to heist santa for get your real present.

name: My Friend the Spider
description: A small "horror" narrative game about isolation and depression.

name: Angry Anna: Halloween Quest 2
description: You're Anna Price, after your long trip in motorbike, you finally found the place for the Halloween Party, but your journey is not starting well...

name: Karan Koron Gakuen: Hanafuda - Mahjong
description: The familiar classic game Hanafuda and Mahjong are coupled with GBC. A unique feature of handheld game consoles, you can easily enjoy Hanafuda and Mahjong anywhere. Let's enjoy the game with 16 cute Hanaran Toryu Gakuen girls who appear in the game. Hanafuda is based on the basic rule of "Koikoi", and there are three modes: "Tournament mode" where you can win out, "Dan certification mode" where you can be certified by winning, and "Competition mode" where you can play against your friends. Mahjong is a three-player mode with four players: "brute force mode" where you can play against all characters, "computer mode" where you can play a tournament-style battle, and "competition mode" where you can enjoy playing against friends.

name: Hong Kong Mahjong
description: Hong Kong Mahjong is a classic Chinese game of skill. Your goal is to try to get the highest point value combination by following the Hong Kong scoring system.

name: Keibajou he Gyoukou! Wide
description: Recommended for horse racing beginners and young couples who go to the racetrack like a date! A tool that allows you to easily predict horse racing simply by entering the winning odds. If you anticipate the newly introduced wide betting ticket, the hit rate will increase further. No detailed information input. The only data required for forecasting is the winning odds displayed in newspapers and racetracks. If there is a horse that is pushed or you want to exclude from the forecast among the racehorses, you can set the evaluation and reflect it in the forecast. You can select the purchase tendency of betting tickets from the four patterns of "Random", "Solid favorite", "Aim for holes", and "Aim for large holes", and the expected results will change accordingly. Of course, it comes with a convenient help function that explains horse racing terms.

name: Harmony's Nightmare
description: Harmony's Nightmare is a multi-genre homebrew Wii game about a young girl's nightmares. The game is divided into 4 levels, each with a different play style. To beat the game you must collect at least 100 notes.

name: Bejeweled 2
description: A port of Bejeweled 2 for in-flight entertainment systems.

name: Witch Tower: Flash
description: Witch Tower: Flash is a pixel-art tower defense game featuring RPG and roguelike mechanics.

name: Bejeweled 2 Aracade
description: Bejeweled 2 Arcade is an arcade port of the game Bejeweled 2. The port lacks many features from the main game and only includes the arcade gamemode.

name: Bejeweled
description: A plug and play port of Bejeweled.

name: Bejeweled
description: An unreleased Game Boy Advance port of the game Bejeweled was in development and set to be published by Majesco in 2002, however was cancelled before release.

name: Horo Nite: MelonMelody
description: Horo Nite: MelonMelody is a free unofficial fan project and a homage to the upcoming Hollow Knight Silksong made in Unity.

name: Jeff the Killer
description: Sin descripción

name: The Mystic Realm
description: A level pack for Sonic Robo Blast 2 with over 30 stages and many secrets to unlock. Famed for being one of the oldest SRB2 mods.

name: Under the Wakzoo
description:
Under the Wakzoo is side view and Roguelite Shooter game. This game is a fan game by YouTuber Woowakgood.
You can obtain various items and guns. Fight monsters in the underground to obtain items and progress through stages by defeating bosses. Ultimately, you must defeat the final boss to save the world.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2 Infinity
description: A total conversion mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2 that changes its gameplay to resemble that of Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity.

name: MADFPSS
description: Ever wanted to experience Madness Combat in the perspective of a character? Now you can! Introducing, MADFPSS is a First Person Action Shooter inspired and based on the Madness Combat series by Matt "Krinkels" Jolly. Developed on the Unity Engine, MADFPSS attempts to capture the adrenaline pumping action of Madness and put it into a game.

name: MADFPS 2
description:
MADFPS 2 is an action first person shooter and sequel to it's previous instalment "MADFPSS"
In this game you play as Mike, a detective from a local police department who, one late evening, receives an anonymous tip about a weapon trafficking cartel disguised as a cleaning company, which is filled with dangerous gang members who won't hesitate to stop you in your tracks. In a bit of a ruthless act, you venture out to clean up the cleaners and murder the owner of the place.

name: Madness Combat FPS: Fueled by Hot Dogs
description:
Use W, A, S, and D to move.
Space to jump, C to crouch
PRESS SPACE AND C AT THE SAME TIME WHILE MOVING TO DIVE!!! You are invulnerable to bullets while you dive, and you'll even get a bonus for dodging bullets
Scroll to switch through weapons in your inventory, or use keys 1, 2, 3. You can hold 2 weapons max
If you're having trouble with the web page scrolling when you try to switch weapons, toggle fullscreen in the options
Press Escape or Q to pause the game and access settings
Press V to pistol whip when you have a gun equipped. I forgot to include in game instructions for it.
Press X to drop your currently held item.
Press E to open cabinets, pick up weapons, and go through unlocked doors. picking up weapons while you already have 2 replaces the currently equipped one.

name: The Bugs
description: The Bugs is a new look at the genre as tower defense. It's a colorful action game with a top view of the small meadow in the grass, mire or sand, which is gradually overgrown with harmful and dangerous flowers, mushrooms or thorns.

name: Horizon of Horus
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through the mesmerizing landscapes of Ancient Egypt in "Horizon of Horus" – a Virtual Reality action-tower defense game. Immerse yourself in a world of magic and mythology, where you are the last line of defense against mythological creatures.

name: Q*Bert
description: NES port of Q*Bert.

name: Winter Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Mole Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Le Temple perdu de l'oncle Ernest
description: You and your Companion Chipikan follow the trails of Uncle Albert, a great adventurer who discovered a secret in the rainforests of South America. By solving riddles, completing tasks and navigating through the notebook of Unlce Albert, which is also the stage for the entire game, you learn about the flora and fauna of Peru as well as the culture and lands of other South American countries.

name: Winter Games
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Pleased Aliens
description:
Short indie game with a few hidden memes!

Human civilization is in danger! Aliens visit the earth, and you must to please them... You must try hard to please them.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is an isometric platform game with puzzle elements where the player controls the titular protagonist from a third-person perspective. Q*bert starts each game at the top of a pyramid of cubes, and moves by jumping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to the target color allows the player to progress to the next stage.

name: Fritz 5
description: Fritz is not just a chess playing monster. It is a friendly chess partner for beginners and amateurs. It will teach you to play chess from scratch, and can automatically adjust its playing strength to suit your needs. It will warn you when you go wrong in a game, giving you hints on how to play better. Fritz 5.32 (32-bit) is a great tool for any chess player desiring to achieve the FIDE Master title. The most useful tool is the "Analyze Game" option, which is like having a grandmaster sitting next to you reviewing your game for mistakes and improvements. Combine Fritz with ChessBase Light and you'll be set for your entire chess career short of the IM and GM titles!

name: Q*bert
description:
Q*bert is a MSX game developed by Konami in 1986. Despite sharing the same name as the original, it has gameplay styled after Q*bert's Qubes.

the title character being replaced by Wrappy (konami MSX research team mascot) that has draconic appearance with small eyes, a visible, expressive mouth, arms, purple skin, yellow spines, and a somewhat long tail.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is an arcade game by Gottlieb. It was ported to the SG-1000 by Tsukuda Original, who marketed it for their Othello Multivision console. The objective of the game is to turn all the cubes on screen to a desired colour by moving Q*bert on top of them. Q*bert can only move in diagonals, and the player needs to be careful not to either send Q*bert off the edge or have him collide with enemies/obstacles. Occasionally cylindrical platforms appear on the edge of the screen, which when jumped on, will take Q*bert to the top. The SG-1000 port is a very bare-bones rendition of the game and is missing many elements seen in the arcade version. It is also much harder as the port sends out more enemies in the first few levels.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is an isometric platform game with puzzle elements where the player controls the titular protagonist from a third-person perspective. Q*bert starts each game at the top of a pyramid of cubes, and moves by jumping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to the target color allows the player to progress to the next stage.

name: Kidou Senkan Nadesico: Ruriruri Mahjong
description: Mahjong game of the anime character "Nadeshiko". Equipped with an automatic level adjustment function, the computer monitors the player's labor saving severely for weak people and severely for strong people, and the strength of the characters is automatically adjusted to guarantee a hot battle at all times. In addition, you can enjoy it without getting bored with the free scenario system where the event changes every time you play. There are 30 characters. Every time you play the adventure part, the number of characters you can play in free battles will increase steadily. In addition, hidden characters are also available. Also, since the cards are hidden in various places, it is possible to collect and print out the cards.

name: Fritz 6
description:
Fritz 6 is a chess simulation which can be adjusted for beginners, advanced players and professionals. In comparison to Fritz 5 its graphics were revised and the menu got improved.

For beginners the game features several help functions, e.g. it explains all possible moves. When making a mistake the virtual coach comes up and helps. For advanced players there are many settings for the AI opponent to get the ideal training partner. The key parts of the programme are the extensive analysis functions. The database consists of 320.000 professional games and has an ELO rating of 2825.

name: Styrlitz 3: Agent USSR
description:
Styrlitz 3 is a comedic point-and-click adventure game. It is a parody of the popular Soviet television series Seventeen Moments of Spring about the exploits of a Soviet spy operating in Nazi Germany under the name Max Otto von Stierlitz. This is the third game in the series.

In this entry in the series, Styrlitz investigated a mysterious crash in space involving the soviet spacecraft with the first woman in space and a UFO.

name: Kinniku Banzuke GB 3: Shinseiki Survival Retsuden!
description: The third in the GB series! The software is exclusively for GBC, and the graphics are more realistic and upgraded. Equipped with "SASUKE2000" that was aired as a special in the fall of 2000. Of course, there are also hidden competitions that are popular in the series, such as "Service Ace," "Power Force," "Super Shot," "Spray Hitter," and "Struck Out Bingo." Including the familiar Kane Kosugi, unique original players only for the game have also appeared! There are plenty of competitions where friends can play against each other with communication cable support, and new rules will expand the play.

name: Styrlitz 4: The Matrix - A Step to Death
description:
Styrlitz 4 is a comedic point-and-click adventure game. It is a parody of the popular Soviet television series Seventeen Moments of Spring about the exploits of a Soviet spy operating in Nazi Germany under the name Max Otto von Stierlitz. This is the fourth game in the series.

In this entry in the series, Styrlitz, now retired, receives a message from a white rabbit that informs him that not all nazis were defeated. The game mainly parodies The Matrix, but there are also references to other movies and TV shows of the 2000s.

name: Edenya
description:
Edenya is French online role-playing game, 100% free, in which you play a character in a completely original medieval-fantasy world. You'll encounter many players from different places and cultures on the site forums or on Discord.

Edenya is a continuous game, so there are no turns, and all actions taken are immediately resolved. If you are new to the world of role-playing games, we recommend checking out the website of the French Federation of Role-Playing Games.

We hope to see you soon in the fantastic world of Edenya.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is an isometric platform game with puzzle elements where the player controls the titular protagonist from a third-person perspective. Q*bert starts each game at the top of a pyramid of cubes, and moves by jumping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to the target color allows the player to progress to the next stage.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is a popular arcade game. The goal is to change all of the tiles on a pyramid to the target color. To do this you guide Q*bert around the pyramid, and every tile he hops on will change color. On early levels, a single hop will change the tile to the desired color, but on later levels, you may need to hop on a tile multiple times or even avoid hopping on a tile multiple times! Trying to stop Q*bert are many different creatures wandering around the board, including Coily the snake, Slick and Sam, and falling balls. On the edge of the board are floating discs; if Q*bert jumps on one of these discs when the snake is in pursuit, the snake will fall off the board while Q*bert is safely transported to the top.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is an isometric platform game with puzzle elements where the player controls the titular protagonist from a third-person perspective. Q*bert starts each game at the top of a pyramid of cubes, and moves by jumping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to the target color allows the player to progress to the next stage.

name: Q*bert
description: All the action and excitement of the popular arcade game are here! Hop Q*bert up and down a pyramid of cubes, changing colors on each of the cube tops. When they're all the same color, Q*bert moves to a new - and more difficult - pyramid. But strange characters want to stop Q*bert from his fanciful mission. You'll have to do some fast hopping in this quick and "quasy" game! 1 or 2 players.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is an isometric platform game with puzzle elements where the player controls the titular protagonist from a third-person perspective. Q*bert starts each game at the top of a pyramid of cubes, and moves by jumping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to the target color allows the player to progress to the next stage.

name: Q*bert
description: Q*bert is an isometric platform game with puzzle elements where the player controls the titular protagonist from a third-person perspective. Q*bert starts each game at the top of a pyramid of cubes, and moves by jumping diagonally from cube to cube. Landing on a cube causes it to change color, and changing every cube to the target color allows the player to progress to the next stage.

name: Q*bert's Qubes
description:
Q*Bert's Qubes is the sequel to the game Q*Bert and features similar gameplay, but is now in three dimensions. Once again your goal is to change multicolored blocks to a target color, but now you must make sure all three visible sides of the blocks match the target color. You control Q*Bert on the playfield of blocks; Q*Bert changes the colors by jumping to a block which will cause it to rotate in the direction of his jump. Unlike the original game, you don't need to change the colors of the whole playfield, but rather need to form straight line(s) of the target colors, and when you do you can move on to the next round. Of course, to make this task more challenging are a variety of creatures (including a giant rat!) that chase you around the playfield.

Each creature is a different color, and if it lands on a block where the top face is the same color then the creature falls off of the playfield, but if Q*Bert gets caught by a creature then a life is lost! As the game progresses, more creatures chase Q*Bert and additional colors are added to the playfield making it tougher to find the target color. There are no longer any discs on the sides of the playfield to carry you to safety, so make sure you don't jump off the edge! To help out, a green ball may appear from time to time; if you catch this, all the enemies become frozen temporarily.

name: Frantic Fred
description:
Help a hilarious bear named 'Frantic Fred' to eat all the apples that falling from the tree and avoiding them hit the ground, while dodging anvils that throw the naughty squirrels to win many tickets!.

If you catch all apples, will go to the bonus round, where you can win up to 500 tickets.

name: Spectral Tower
description: Sinners are being drawn to a nameless town somewhere in Neverland, as if they were being attracted like iron to a magnet. Some had been gathering people for war, while others had been hurting others for their own gain. It was as if they all had their own cross to bear. In the middle of the continent, rose the Spectral Tower, which reflected in their eyes. It is said that a new world will open up for those who can make it to the top of that tower...

name: Spectral Tower II
description:
Neverland is a lush, green world told of in ancient traditions.

An enormous tower stretched high up into its sky, said to contain "Infinite Power" and "Eternal Life" within its walls.

In times past, a great deal of travelers and adventurers went to the tower in search of those "powers buried within," yet not one of them was able to solve the mystery.
It was a time of legends that have begun to fade from tradition--with young trees growing in abundance.

One young traveler from a faraway land pressed forth on his journey to the tower. Little did he know this journey would have a profound effect on the fate of the world.

name: The 3rd Night
description: The 3rd Night was a short 3D experiment made in Construct 2 (using the Q3D plugin). We decided to give it a shot and made this in around 15 days, just in time for the Haunted PS1's Horrifying Halloween game jam.
