name: RPG Tsukuuru DS
description:
RPG Tsukuuru DS, translated as RPG Maker DS in English, is a Japan-exclusive DS game where players can create their own RPG.

RPG Tsukuuru DS allows you to easily create RPGs without any previous knowledge.
Creating a game is as simple as creating the main character that appears in the story, drawing a map, and setting up the production to your liking. You can also create items, weapons, monsters, etc. The layout and controls are fairly simple, so even users who are trying to create a game for the first time can feel at ease. Anyone can feel like a game developer!

name: Head the Ball
description: Sin descripción

name: Satomi no Nazo
description:
Satomi no Nazo is a 2D RPG about a young boy trying to stop a dangerous cult that's trying to destroy the world. It's up to him and his dog to travel across different lands to try and stop them. During the journey, he meets other colorful characters that come to join.

The cast overall includes: Saya, Izumi, Grumpy the Dog, and Haekel.

name: Oookuki
description:
The chronicles of the Oooku, the women's quarters of Edo Castle, is remembered infamously in Japan as a classic kusoge, slang for a very bad video game.

The story revolves around discourse between some of the women in the Oooku over the current shogun, which eventually leads to the player needing to endlessly search around a huge amount of empty rooms and withstand annoying load times as you interview people for their testimonies. There's spelling errors throughout the entire game, as well as typographical errors that have the Edo era characters speaking very modern at unexpected times. The graphics were criticized as especially ugly in 2008 when the PS3 was gaining popularity, and the narrative is hard to follow as the text moves automatically with no text log. Everything is timed, and knowing what to do next is very difficult without a guide.

After gathering all your information throughout the year, you have a trial, which can result in different endings.

name: Kisekae Series 2: Oshare Nikki
description: The second in the Kisekae series! This time, the contents include all fashionable items, including accessories and hair arrangements. You can get various types of clothes such as casual, street, and romantic, and you can combine them freely. Of course, special clothes are also available! In addition to face makeup, pierced earrings, rings, cuticles, etc. have also appeared, and hair can be arranged at the beauty salon. Six boys and four girls will appear, and the drama will develop in a fun high school life. Various events such as clubs and school events occur.

name: Kamishiro Gakuen Maboroshi Kouroku Kuru Nugia
description:
An infamous kusoge released in Japan for the PlayStation 2. Kamishiro Gakuen Maboroshi Kouroku Kuru NuGiA, often just shortened to "Nugya", is about a story that unfolds in both modern times and the Taisho era, surrounding the "Kamiyori" that occurs once every 100 years in the town of Jindai. The main characters, one in the modern era and one in the Taisho era, both help to fight against demons.

Battles are turn-based, including a system in which you can use interchangeable skills. There is a "feeling system" that responds with "joy, anger, sadness, or pleasure" depending on the situation, but it has almost no relationship with the progress of the main game.

name: Kisekae Series 3: Kisekae Hamster
description: The Kisekae series following "Kisekae Monogatari" and "Fashionable Diary". In the game, I go to a ham school to study and challenge a vocational exam. If you pass the desired occupation, you can get clothes suitable for that occupation. There are more than 100,000 combinations of coordination, more than 10 times the previous work! Moreover, boy characters can also be played. You can also strengthen the communication function to make friends' characters appear and enjoy e-mails and bulletin boards. Personality fortune-telling is classified into 64 patterns, so the probability of hitting it may be high!

name: For The Entity
description:
Your designs have caught the attention of an unknown organization. They require you to print 120,000$ for their "client" by midnight. The time is 23:45.

You've printed a lot of cash for a lot of people, but this... What is this?

name: Konchuu Hakase 3
description: A game that focuses on "the fun of finding and catching insects" by collecting insects that live in mountains and rivers in various ways. Take on the challenge of collecting insects by making full use of various actions such as crouching, dashing, catching hats, and catching directly above! Collected insects can be bred at home or exhibited at fairs. Insects that have been successfully bred will be recorded in the picture book. You can exchange insects with your friends by using a communication cable.

name: Fallout ZX
description: Little project about the Fallout saga. This is GD49Games' idea of what the game would be like if it had been released for the ZX Spectrum. Discover the 128 shelter and what will be your mission.

name: The Bet
description:
The game is divided into 5 levels. The protagonist will have to climb the 5 highest mountains in Italy for a bet. But his fierce opponent will make sure that he doesn't win by throwing him anything and everything. Moreover, he has installed sharp obstacles and just touching them is certain death.
Fatigue will be felt, and to recover the lost energy, during the journey there will be water bottles that will restore it (only one notch at a time).

name: Fallout: Nuevo Mexico
description: Welcome to the Land of Enchantment. The year is 2166 - 5 years after the events of "Fallout: A Post Nuclear Role-Playing Game." Every choice made will revolutionize the future for better or worse. Built on the Fallout: New Vegas engine, this free full-on RPG based Modification brings you a brand-new Fallout experience.

name: Vic Nibbler
description: Vic Nibbler is a new game made in 2019 for the Commodore Vic 20 computer with a 3K RAM expansion.

name: Shootagem
description:
Shootagem is a lightgun based puzzle game for the Sega Master System.

Shooting a gem will drop the gems above it down. By shooting out gems, match 3 or more gems in a row or column to score! Clearing multiple sets of gems in quick succession will add to your combo which will increase the points scored.

The timer is ticking down and it's game over when it hits zero. Clearing rows and columns will add time to the timer and you'll get more time added for longer rows of gems. After clearing enough lines, more and more worthless rocks will start to enter the play area which you'll have to clear them out by shooting them.

name: Donkey SMS
description: Sin descripción

name: GB Lunar Lander
description:
Introducing "GB Lunar Lander" – the ultimate lunar landing adventure designed exclusively for the iconic Game Boy! Defy gravity, navigate treacherous terrain, and prove your piloting skills in space.

Embark on a nostalgic journey as an intrepid astronaut tasked with safely landing spacecraft on the rugged lunar surface. With retro '1-bit' aesthetics and addictive gameplay, GB Lunar Lander merges classic charm with modern mechanics for an unforgettable lunar odyssey.

Guide your spacecraft through obstacles, counteract lunar gravity, and touch down on designated landing zones. But beware of escalating challenges like asteroids and treacherous caverns!

Inspired by "Lunar Lander 1979" and "Lunar Lander" for the gameboy(it was only released in Japan!)

name: Les Visiteurs
description: Les Visiteurs is an Action game, developed by Gaumont Multimedia and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 1999.

name: Super Breakout
description: A port for Atari 8-bit consoles.

name: Super Breakout
description: A port for Atari ST consoles.

name: Fia's Night Out
description:
Fia's mother just put her to bed, but Fia can't possibly rest like this! There's still so much to do! So many sights to see! So many desserts to eat!

Fia sneaks out to get what she wants and everything is normal.

name: Tank Fight
description: Tank Fight is an online multiplayer fighting game where you upgrade your tank and compete with others until someone wins. You can mess around with friends or join public lobbies.

name: Save the Watermelon
description: It's time to save the Watermelon!... or Earth... or the moths... You may have to figure that out for yourself... As seen in the short film "Playtesting a top secret video game" by comedy duo Chris & Jack.

name: Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase
description:
Welcome to the world of "Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase" - an exciting arcade race in the style of cyberpunk, where adrenaline and drift are combined with an endless chase from the police. In this exciting game you have to enter a dangerous race for freedom, on the sparkling streets of a neon city.

Get into the driver's seat of a racing car of the future, ready to do anything for the sake of escape. You will have to perform epic drift maneuvers, compete in races on the edge of possibilities, skillfully dodge police patrols and maneuver between obstacles that arise on the way.

With each race, your courage will be tested: the adrenaline chase will begin, where your virtuoso driving and drifting skills will be real tests. You are waiting for an arcade race in the style of cyberpunk, where you will be surrounded by bright neon lights and electronic music will raise the adrenaline to the limit.

The main goal is to escape as far as possible until the police overtake you. The chase will be continuous, and the game will last until your virtuoso driving fails you. Your score will grow with every meter of the way, and you will be able to exchange the points earned for new cars in the store. There is no limit to competitions and chases, and your skill will determine how far you can advance.

"Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase" is a game that will give you adrenaline and tension, remaining in your memory as an exciting experience of arcade racing and skillful drift in the world of cyberpunk. Enter the race, dodge the cops and show your skills in this dynamic game that promises to never stop.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Special Edition
description: Deep Rock Galactic is a first-person co-operative sci-fi shooter for up to 4 players, featuring fully procedural and destructible environments to explore, mine, and explode your way through to reach your objectives. As a team of veteran dwarven space miners, you must take on perilous missions for the interplanetary mining corporation Deep Rock Galactic and go where no-one else dares, into the deepest, most dangerous cave systems of the most hostile planet ever discovered.

name: Wings Out of Shadow
description: Wings Out of Shadow is a game named for a short story in the Berserker series by Fred Saberhagen, involving the hospital ship the Hope, its escort carrier Judith, and their complement of nine outnumbered fighter ships. Saberhagen wrote the in-game text.

name: CRW 2
description: CRW 2 is a Strategy Mecha game sequel to CRW (Counter Rebellion Wars).

name: Car Town Streets
description: Build and race with all your favorite cars on Vehicle District Street. Rule the streets with your car and bring back the town's former glory in its quest for Roxy. Form teams and compete in head-to-head racing battles for the ultimate victory. Build your car empire in Town today!

name: Pajama Sam 2: Thunder and Lightning Aren't so Frightening
description: Join Pajama Sam, the world's youngest superhero as he journeys to World Wide Weather, the storm-stirring factory in the sky! Sam's spent on to many evenings cowering under the couch, so he sets out to conquest his fear of thunderstorms. Just as our little guy begins to learn that storms aren't as bad as they seem, Sam accidentally send the weather system into a frenzy. Now, there is snow in Saigon, and sunshine in Seattle! He'll need your child's help to explore this wonderful world filled with challenging puzzles, fun games, and fantastic new friends as they help Thunder and Lightning fix the broken machines and return the world's weather to normal before Mother Nature finds out!

name: Meme Supreme
description: Welcome to the meme graveyard! Meme Supreme is a simple matching game with nostalgic meme references. Race against the clock to match all of the cards before the timer reaches zero! Do you have what it takes to reminisce these long-forgotten memes?

name: Tentacle Girl
description: Aoi and Sally, a treasure hunter, found a cave during the expedition. They foresee a treasure in it. So I decided to go in and take a look. Unexpectedly, this is a tentacled cave.

name: The F.A. Premier League Football Manager 2002
description: The F.A. Premier League Football Manager 2002 is a Sports game, published by Electronic Arts, which was released in Europe in 2001.

name: Lacey's Wardrobe
description: Lacey needs your help to find the best outfits for every occasion. Play dress-up Lacey and experience amazing moments with her!

name: Ucube: Uyan
description: Sin descripción

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light
description: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light is an upcoming game from Bushiroad Games.

name: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact
description: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is an upcoming Hunter x Hunter fighting game, developed by Eighting and published by Bushiroad Games.

name: Lilja and Natsuka: Painting Lies
description: "What are the colors of your heart?" The heartwarming story of Lilja, a blind painter, and Natsuka, her energetic assistant, who unravel the mysteries behind their clients' requests. An all-new visual novel presented by Frontwing."

name: Lilac
description: Lilac is an upcoming visual novel developed by Frontwing about an interspecies academy story between wizards and humans that depicts the “ordinary” within the “extraordinary.”

name: Dusk Index: Gion
description: Dusk Index: Gion is an upcoming psycho-suspense adventure game from Tokyo Dark creator Cherrymochi in collaboration with Bushiroad Games.

name: Virtual Girl @ World's End
description: A visual novel developed by HEADLOCK about Virtual YouTubers in an apocalyptic world.

name: Rockman 2024 New Year's Hack
description: A small hack to celebrate New Years 2024, Year of the Dragon.

name: Iroiro.
description: Slip out of your monochrome room, and listen to the stories told by the girls of various colors.

name: Friendship
description:
Risa, a typical middle schooler, pays her friend, Mio, a visit. She rings the doorbell to her house but gets no response. Just as Risa was about to head home, she hears her friend's voice calling out "Help me..."

One person's memories and manuscripts, themed around the importance of friendship.

name: A Liminal Place Remaster
description:
Hello, wanderer.

You somehow got to this weird place, now, you have to get out! Simple, right? Of course not. If you lose your sanity and get distracted by some beautiful landscape... Ah, your days are numbered. Find the exit, and preferably be alive.
Explore a Lonely World, Alone. Or with Unpleasant Company.

ALP makes the world of Backrooms more solitary, and a little relaxing.
Run Wherever You Want, Even To Secret Places.

No one will disturb you, unless you go where you shouldn't.
About Our Game.

ALP (A Liminal Place) is being created by only one person, Hazard. I was inspired by several creators, such as Vini Cortez, DCE, Valentin, and Many others. I've always dreamed of creating Backrooms games. The Game will be released soon.

name: A Vítima de Ouro
description: A Vítima de Ouro is a point-and-click mystery adventure where you follow Elisabeth Fleur, who's investigating the murder of millionaire Julius Absolom on the isolated Lighthouse Island.

name: Overdrive Warfare
description: Overdrive Warfare is a dark, gritty FPS shooter developed by the indie developer known as Dynamite. Immerse yourself in the gripping narrative of a harrowing modern-day conflict unfolding as global coalition forces unite against an insidious and unyielding enemy.

name: Risk
description: A PC version of the strategic Hasbro board game Risk.

name: Ultimate Sim Series
description: This is a collection of 3 Maxis titles bundled together: SimCity 2000: Special Edition, Streets of SimCity, and SimCopter.

name: Escalator
description:
Escalator is escape room game like The Exit 8.
This is a horror game in which you must find something unusual while riding an escalator and try to escape from an enclosed space.

name: Kimekyawa: Genkai Beat-chan
description: Flatten cute monsters in a fun way!

name: Hasbro Classic Game Collection
description: A collection of video games based on four classic Hasbro board games: Monopoly, Monopoly: Here and Now, Risk, and Scrabble.

name: PopCap Greatest Hits
description: PopCap Greatest Hits is a physical bundle of Peggle Deluxe, Bejeweled 2 Deluxe, and Zuma Deluxe.

name: Manipulation
description:
"I never meant for this to happen. You'll still be by my side, won't you?"

What was supposed to be a healthy break from the hustle and bustle of city life, turned into tragedy.

Maybe if they weren't so selfish, things could've gone differently.

name: Super Markus 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario vs. WarioWare
description: A mod which turns Super Mario 64 into a microgame compilation.

name: Spatial Savior Biganger
description: CAN YOU EVEN ESCAPE? Battle against the endless horde of robots in the inescapable world inside the black hole! The clock is ticking!

name: Gingy's Gift Grab
description: Help Gingy collect as many gifts as possible before the time runs out.

name: Kumitantei: Old-School Slaughter
description:
Janus Institute's Class of '89 are trapped and forced to kill eachother 'for science', is survival in the cards?
It's a new murder-mystery adventure game inspired by retro anime, with gameplay ranging from deck-building and tense card battles to classic socialising and puzzle-solving!

name: The Lost Signal: SCP
description:
"Lost Signal" agency investigates paranormal events from all around the world. You are one of the agents who participates in the research of various artifacts. Investigate paranormal activities in this 3D game which has great action and elaborate 3D graphics!

Interesting quests and creepy monsters await you! New artifacts or paranormal events in every update!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Random Wees Dave & Bambi Extended
description: Friday Night Funkin': Random Wees Dave & Bambi Extended is a mod directed and created by Sanco the fox, with the participation of juani clowny rabbit, Brick boy, LilyUwU, arten, and THE BIG BOSS lmao. The mod is a fan-made extension of Vs. Dave and Bambi.

name: Stephen Hawking and His Battle with MND
description: A game about the life of Stephen Hawking and his battle with ALS a form of Motor Neurone Disease.

name: The Daily Diff
description: A spot the difference game which updates the puzzle daily. Each image contains 10 differences, with some obvious and others more hidden.

name: YouTube Poop World
description:
Welcome to a world unlike ours.

This world is very unusual. It builds from the remains of our own civilization and, in a very odd twist, has many of its people based on characters that have made appearences in YouTube Poops! The world is run by an empire controlled by celebrities in the YTP Community, and its cities based on the ones seen in said poops.

Although the world seems peaceful, it is quite chaotic. I.M. Meen, of all people, has damaged the world's reputation by killing off bronies and making deals with other enemies to take over this fine world! It seems that the world has become a cesspool of sin...

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: In Real Time
description: You work the nightshift at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza looking out for the animatronics, now moving towards you in real time. Relive FNAF 1 with a moving animatronics camera system; but as we all know, the animatronics tend to wander a bit.

name: Picky
description: Picky is the name of the project which would later be released as Pikmin. Development migrated to the GameCube because it would be able to have more characters on the screen at once. Aside from concept artwork, there are no pictures of the game in this development stage.

name: Covemount
description: A browser sokoban game by the developer of Baba is You.

name: Outlast Mobile
description: Sin descripción

name: Mothers and Daughters
description: Mothers & Daughters is an adult visual novel in which you play as 18 year old Max (name customizable). Max worked hard to finish high school and passed with the relevant grades to get into a local college. There was one thing Max failed at in high school – losing his virginity. Can you help him with that?

name: Asha Empire Online
description: Asha Empire Online is a vast and dynamic gaming experience, seamlessly blending elements from strategy, first-person shooting (FPS), and role-playing (RPG) genres. Players initially embark on their journey on the planet Vita Nova, but the game's unique feature allows for interstellar exploration of other planets, space stations, and outposts. Vigilant forces from the empire ensure safe zones for peaceful interactions. In this game, players use Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) to represent their characters, with each NFT offering unique attributes and the ability to be traded among players. The primary goal is to complete tasks, gain experience, acquire assets, engage in battles, and explore. Resource production, organization management, and survival mechanics are key elements. All transactions within the game are conducted using the AEC currency, and owning an NFT character is required for full gameplay.

name: Fears to Fathom: Woodbury Getaway
description: In the fifth episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Sydney Harper, a 23-year-old working at a consulting firm plans a weekend getaway to a rental in Woodbury with her college friends. Little did they know what was about to unfold during their stay. Sydney survived as she made the right choices.

name: Cadenza: Fame, Theft and Murder - Collector's Edition
description: It's the height of the Fabulous Fifties in your hometown of Las Vegas, and life is good! Rock n' roll is king, and you're the new king of rock n' roll. You’re on top of the world! But you come tumbling down hard when a stranger crashes your concert and swaps places with you. Trapped in a strange body, wanted for murder, and on the run from the police, you're in a race against time to get your life back before the clock runs out! Can you reclaim your rock n' roll throne, or will this be your final encore?

name: Serapis Online
description:
Serapis Online, an MMORPG, intricately immerses players in the rich cultures of ancient China, Arabia, and Europe. Reviving the historical Silk Road—a vital trade route connecting Asia and Europe—Serapis Online offers a journey through forgotten tales of glory and adventure.

Embark on an exploration of a new world, brimming with engaging and ever-evolving adventures, as players experience the magic of ancient civilizations firsthand.

name: SimMania for Kids
description: A physical bundle of six Maxis games: SimTown, SimPark, SimSafari, SimTunes, Widget Workshop, and SimAnt.

name: EA Strategy Collection
description: This is a physical bundle of five EA games: The Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle-Earth, Black and White 2, Black and White 2 - Battle of the Gods, Command & Conquer: Generals, and Command & Conquer: Generals - Zero Hour.

name: Collector's Edition: 007 Racing / Medal of Honor / Tomorrow Never Dies
description: This is a physical package of 007 Racing, Medal of Honor, and James Bond 007: Tomorrow Never Dies. The "Collector's Edition" aspect is shown with a distinct white PlayStation label on the front covers of each jewel case.

name: Star86
description: Star86 is a free online virtual world for kids that can be played in a web browser. Embark on a musical journey through the universe, creating music with other kids from all over the globe. Make new friends in a safe online environment, customize your own avatar and decorate your own home in a spaceship.

name: Artisan TD
description: Artisan TD is a Maze-style Tower Defense where you survive by building mazes on over 40 unique maps.

name: Nope quiz
description: Nope Quiz is a puzzle game. This crazy quiz features an extravagant host who tries to stick you with particularly sneaky and funny questions. It's up to you to surpass yourself and win the challenge.

name: Make More Views
description:
The Internet is on the verge of collapse, there is only one option to save it: restart video production!

Conquer subscribers by creating and managing your gaming, lifestyle, science or sports channels. Reply to your viewers' comments and accumulate billions of views! Armed with your camera, microphone, green screen, and accompanied by your loyal employees - editor, screenwriter, community manager - go to war against the malware that is decimating the network.

name: Ta Mère En Slip
description:
Have fun with your friends or family!

With 2 or up to 12, turn the smartphone facing the others and guess your card combination first.

Am I a man? A singer ? Should I light the fire? Am I at the beautician?

The combinations are crazy and you can add as many characters and action as you want.

For connoisseurs of the Ta Mère en Slip board game, here are the improvements:

- Up to 12 players
- 3 times more cards
- Possibility of adding cards endlessly
- Choice of timer duration
- It fits in your pocket

name: Hachu's Revenge
description: Fan-made game for HAchubby

name: Limite Limite
description: Limite Limite is a game whose goal is to create the funniest card associations.

name: Smash Remix: Spider-Man
description: A mod for Smash Remix (Super Smash Bros. mod) which adds Spider-Man as a playable character.

name: Dogs Club
description: Dogs Club is a challenging parkour game that can be played in Singleplayer and Multiplayer. Complete the tracks in the fastest time and take yourself and your country to the top of the leaderboard.

name: The Sims Medieval: Limited Edition
description: This version of the Sims Medieval adds three themed throne rooms with Barbarian, Dark Magic and Princess themes as well as the Monarch and Executioner outfit sets.

name: 7 Wonders Trilogy
description: This is a trilogy of three games in the 7 Wonders series on one disc: 7 Wonders of the Ancient World, 7 Wonders II, and 7 Wonders: Treasures of Seven.

name: Lightning Crashes
description: After a bright flash of lightning, Mario finds himself in a strange place. He assumes Bowser caused this and is now going to try and find out where he is and how to get back to the Mushroom Kingdom. This hack has 51 exits.

name: Super Mario Redux
description: This is a not-quite-vanilla hack Noivem has been working on for the past year or so. There's not any groundbreaking stuff in it; the goal was just to make fun levels. There's 62 exits.

name: Super Mario in: Yoshi's Revenge
description:
An unprecedented new enemy has emerged. His plan, to kidnap Princess Peach. Now it's up to Mario to save her and subdue this new foe.

Old Friendships will be lost, new freinds will be made, and Mario will learn a valuable lesson.

-5 worlds + 53 exits + Koopa-ventures-

name: It's another hack with Mario in it! Yay!
description:
Help Mario to run and jump over stuff! Oh, and save some baby Yoshi eggs, too.
This hack has custom music and palletes, several simple ASM edits, some altered graphics and an original overworld. The demo contains the first four worlds and 41 available exits.

name: Carbrix
description:
Carbrix is a physics-based open-world vehicle building game
where you the player can make almost any vehicle your heart desires

name: Trampled Flower
description:
The game focuses on Quinn, a young teen wandering and sleeping in their room. But nothing is as it seems.

The plot is kept vague as It's up to the player to make their own conclusion and find the "truth" about these whole instances. A dream? Reality? Delusion? You decide.

name: Merchant Life
description:
You've been summoned to another world.
What was waiting for you there was a harsh merchant life ...

name: RockMen X
description: A Mega Man X-style action game in which Iris plays an active role.

name: Resident Evil Demake
description:
Resident Evil Demake its like name says, the first Resident Evil made like running in a NES in 2D, the graphics and music have a 8bit style.
The main mode with Jill is a shooter game, similar to the original game but in 2D.
There's new game modes like one for Chris with some RPG features.
Many graphics are self-made, seeing the original game and making the sprites.
I also made new music for some scenes.

name: Blade X: Odyssey of Heroes
description:
Blade X, the sequel to the Blade series which was the first action RPG to surpass 5 million downloads, is known for its spectacular action and smooth controls. Known for its console-like storytelling and high-quality graphics despite being a mobile game, the Blade series previously achieved top rankings on both the App Store and Google Play Store, ranking 1st and 2nd.

Blade X continues the unique world and story of the previous Blade series, offering various content for character growth. Players can engage in story-based Scenario Mode, protect the NPC while fending off monsters in the Guardian Mode, defeat over 30 boss monsters and obtain rewards in the Sealed Relic Tower, and participate in the ranking competition based on character growth progress in the Dimension Gate.

name: Meta-Ghost: The Breaking Show
description: Immerse yourself in the reality show — "Breaking Show", where you engage in real-time battles with various intelligent machines using cybernetic enhancements and weapons. Whether for personal gain or lofty ideals. Fight! Until you reach the final victory on this Roguelike journey.

name: Super Tank
description: Combat clone.

name: Enigma II
description: Space shooter

name: The Man Man
description: Be a serial killer, with no bones tho.

name: Tamagotchi Adventure Kingdom
description:
From the most beloved virtual friends franchise of all time comes a new and wonderful journey for all the adventurers out there. Welcome to Tamagotchi Adventure Kingdom!

Join our adorable hero Mametchi as he travels far and wide across the world to solve problems, make friends, and use the power of happiness to restore the kingdom. Build and decorate your wilderness camp and invite your most loyal Tamagotchi companions to have fun together.

name: Yokai Ningen Bem: Aratanaru Tamashii No Meikyuu
description: Role-Playing game, developed and published by Vantan International, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Road Rash
description: Sin descripción

name: Road Rash
description:
The Master System version of Road Rash retains the vast majority of content over its Mega Drive counterpart, though most of the graphics were re-drawn for the smaller resolution and fewer colors given by the hardware. On the Master System, the top speed is lowered, and much of the road-side scenery has been removed, and there appears to be fewer racers on the track at any given time. While the track layouts are broadly the same, hills are less pronounced on the Master System, and take longer to complete due to the aforementioned speed issues.

All digitized sound has been removed, as has the rev counter in the HUD. The Game Gear port is much the same as the Master System conversion, but has to reduce the size of its HUD further in order to fit all important details onto the screen. This also means less of the road is visible to the player.

name: Road Rash
description: Sin descripción

name: Math Mayhem!!
description: Math Mayhem!! is a math game available on mobile platforms. Master arithmetic, including multiplication, addition, subtraction, and division, while having fun and relieving stress.

name: Marble Madness
description: The idea of this arcade game is deceptively simple: Guide a marble down a path without hitting any obstacles or straying off the course. The game is viewed from an isometric perspective, which makes it harder to stay focused on the direction the ball is to follow. There are tight corridors to follow and enemies to avoid. There is a 2-player mode in which players must race to the finish; otherwise you're racing against the clock.

In this game, you take on the role of a tribal leader and delve into the rugged and thrilling era of the Norsemen. Your task is to establish, expand, and protect a flourishing settlement while meeting the needs and desires of your inhabita...

description: The Respawn Banter is an adventure and visual novel hybrid where you are bound to die during your exploration. In the afterlife, the goddess of life’s role extends beyond mere revival: she seizes every opportunity to humor the hero’s demise, making each encounter a one-of-a-kind witty exchange.

description: You play as an astronaut sent to the planet Carthanc on a top secret mission, hidden from the public. Is there life on Carthanc? If so, is it friendly? Can Carthanc sustain human life? Is it a viable candidate to terraform? Time for you to find out! You are tasked with collecting samples, filming footage, deploying tech, and determining if any life exists.

After the last great war, a small and previously unnoticed planet, Zokbar J, seized the opportunity and pounced on the broken pieces, creating the "Syndicate," which now vies for domination of the galaxy. You defected, and now control Harmony, a large Fitzholium miner, and can manage your planets' resources to build a fleet and defeat the Syndicate.

name: Thrillville
description:
Experience Thrillville originally released on the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Thrillville allows gamers of all ages to easily build and customize the coaster of your dreams. Gone are the days of the complex PC techniques used in other coaster games. Rather, Thrillville's easy to use building mode has been designed specifically for the console platforms and makes building all 75-plus rides from wooden, corkscrew and inverted coasters to merry go rounds, trains and carnival rides, easy, and most importantly, fun. Imagination is the only height limit with Thrillville, where the fun ranges from racing on go-kart tracks you put together and playing mini-golf on courses you designed to dozens of party games, from bumper cars to arcade shoot-'em-ups. You can also tour the park on foot - a first for theme-park titles - chatting and joking with all the guests to help them out and make sure they're enjoying themselves.

• Build, manage, ride, customize and socialize your way through the five theme parks you've created
• The simplest, most intuitive development tools available for all 75-plus ride types, from wooden, corkscrew and inverted coasters to merry-go-rounds, trains and all your favorite carnival rides
• Play classic midway games like bumper cars, saucer soccer, remote-control cars, shooting gallery, mini-golf, rhythm challenges, arcade-style shoot- em-ups and puzzlers
• Interact and develop a relationship with any guests you see - Listen to and address their unique concerns about your park, joke with them, and even help a guest impress his crush by winning that special prize
• Explore 15 different themed areas spread across five theme parks, such as Pirates Gone Wild, Gold Rush, Ancient Treasures of Egypt and Moon Base

name: Thrillville: Off the Rails
description:
Experience Thrillville: Off the Rails originally released on the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Thrillville: Off the Rails lives up to its name with 20 death-defying rides so outrageous, they inspire the same word from every park visitor who sees them: “WHOA!” Players build these incredible “WHOA Coasters” to leap from one track to another, launch through the air like cannonballs, blast through a burning ring of fire and more.
But the new fun doesn’t stop there. Off the Rails features 34 playable minigames, 15 all-new theme areas, over 40 thrill rides, a new story that ties together more than 100 missions, and social interaction with park guests that’s better than ever. The in-depth conversations both advance the plot and suggest better ways to manage the park. But is every guest to be trusted? and rides.and rides.

• Experience the visceral fun of interacting with a theme park you create.
Build and ride your own creations, talk and joke with all your guests, and play dozens of minigames
• Visit 15 themed areas, like Battleville, Winterville, Spaceville and Aeroville, all spread throughout five new parks
• Create 20 death-defying WHOA Coasters such as:
Hotrod Stunt - A nitro boost propels a car across a broken track
Pendulizer - A giant arm grabs the car just before a gap in the track, whips it around in a full circle, then sets it down on the other side
Escape Drop - The track holds the car stationary as it lifts itself from level ground to a full 90-degree drop. Then it lets go
• Distinguish your rides even more with enhanced customization options • Attach animatronics, flowers and flaming hoops to all of your coasters and rides
• Play 34 minigames – 14 new, 20 returning from the original Thrillville but with new levels

description: This is a version of Dead Rising 3 released alongside the Xbox One as a launch title. This version features a silver background front cover and exclusive tribute packs to Frank West and Chuck Greene.

name: Ski Simulator: Winter Sports
description: In "Ski Simulator: Winter Sports," players are on a quest to earn points and unlock new levels by mastering the art of skiing or snowboarding. Navigate through the exhilarating slopes, collecting checkpoints along the way to progress further in the game. But beware, time is of the essence – the clock is ticking, and every second counts!

name: Upward
description: Upward is a platform game where we progress upwards, overcoming obstacles on an island where we crashed with a plane accident. On 10 different levels, each featuring distinct colors, various platforms, and challenges await you.

name: Urban Jungle
description: Turn your home into a green haven in Urban Jungle. Find the best place for each plant in your tiny apartment and enjoy gardening without worries. And don't forget to pet the cat!

name: Uncrowned
description: Set sail in Uncrowned, an age of sail adventure where you command a struggling colony under an oppressive monarchy, and chart a course towards independence. Will you seek fortune through cunning trade or brandish the sword as a fearsome pirate? Your choices shape the destiny of your people.

name: Unilife
description: A survival RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Confront waves of enemies, enhance your character and gear, and fortify your base. Explore, gather resources, and tackle the ultimate challenge of survival in this immersive game.

name: UnDuster
description: UnDuster is a fast-paced ultrafastidious retro platformer combining the skill-based dashing from mountain climbing with unadulterated blasting inspired by the best rocket jumping of the '10s. Make your way through multiple areas with varied challenges and collect their stickers to attain your glory.

name: Underground secret
description: This is a strategy game with a cartoon style square grid that looks very fresh and cute, and the exciting background music is exhilarating.

name: Undeads
description: Embark on a risky but exciting journey through the world of Undeads. Search for weapons, armor, supplies and medicine. Survive or hunt survivors. Enjoy unique matches, sell your loot, and fight bloody and challenging battles against the background of the zombie apocalypse!

name: Under The Mask
description: You will become a returnee from the underworld whose soul resides in a mask. Extract the mask, explore the surrounding area, encounter events, and continuously become stronger! At the end of time, use the masks you collected to give the final enemy a fatal blow! ! !

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

description: "Unknown Memoirs" is a short horror game series focusing on distressing tales of horror. "Stormy Night" sets the player in a world where an unnatural storm has been going on for days. As the player explores the world around them, things start to take a turn towards the unnatural.

name: Unknown Soul With Me
description: This is a game where you play as a young girl abandoned in a dungeon. who was saved by a mysterious spirit The spirit introduced himself as having lived in this place. But can't go anywhere The young girl wanted to set this soul free. They worked together to find a way out of this place.

name: Up to no Goob
description: Up to no Goob is a reverse tower defense/bullet hell which follows a goblin named Goob. Goob is very hungry and needs to liberate animals from the rather nice evil farmers in order to make himself an omelet.

name: Truth
description: A horror game where you are in a hotel with an entity that only comes out in the dark. Your goal is to find the hotel owner hidden somewhere among the rooms...

name: Trust No One
description: You'll need to think outside more than just the box. In "Trust No One,” a point-and-click detective adventure, you play as a journalist who tries to unravel a web of secrets about a mysterious AI-company. Explore the nooks and alleyways of Kyiv to discover the identity of your informant.

name: Trupki
description: The tiniest slide and connect puzzle game.

name: Geometric Brothers: Advance Pack
description:
Make use of each stage's special features, and victory is within your grasp!
Meet the 6 new characters from a rival family, known as the Rival Brothers!
Defeat waves of enemies one after another and earn points!
Increase your score and climb the leaderboards all the way to the top!

name: Ginga Ojou-sama Densetsu Yuna FX: Kanashimi no Siren
description: The third game in the Galaxy Fräulein Yuna series, Kanashimi no Sirene picks up where the last game ended. After having successfully saved the Earth, Yuna and her new friend, the ever-hungry female android Yuri Cube, return to their normal high school life – or so they think. Because her old enemies will do anything to destroy her, including wrongly accusing her of world domination plans. This draws the attention of a highly ranked female intelligence officer of the Galaxy Alliance, who operated under codename “Sirene” and who pretends to be an exchange student in the Shiraokadai High School, while her true goal is to arrest Yuna… Kanashimi no Sirene plays similarly to the other games in the series, with the main gameplay consisting of being taken automatically to different screen and making dialogue choices. There are also turn-based battles, during which the player has to choose the right attacks at the right time to defeat the opponents. There are also a few mini-games that appear during the course of the game, such as a quiz show and a slot machine-type game with the purpose of getting new clothes for Yuna. There is an extensive “Extras” menu in the game, which features character album, graphical sketches, photos of various material connected to the series (such as magazines or covers of previous games) etc.

name: Hataraku Shoujo: Tekipaki Working Love FX
description: Tekipaki: Working Love FX is essentially an upgraded version of Tekipaki: Working Love for Turbo CD. It adds several scenarios to the main game, which play mostly like a Japanese-style adventure - the player can choose dialogue options or a location to go to. Those scenarios add more background to the personalities of Naomi, Hikaru, and Edalt, the three extra-terrestrial heroines of the game (for example, in one of the scenarios Hikaru's Martian cat escapes from the zoo, and it's the player's job to find him). The PC-FX version of the game also adds an "omake" option, where it is possible to view pictures of the girls.

name: Bright kingdom
description: Bright kingdom - a strategy game with magic and soldiers, where you defend the kingdom from enemies

name: Brilliance
description: 《Brilliance》 is a 2D horizontal platform jumping game where you need to use jumps, dashes, super dashes, squats super dashes to get through levels.

description: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Seattle Surge Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - Toronto Ultra Team Pack 2024
description: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Toronto Ultra Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - Vegas Legion Team Pack 2024
description: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Vegas Legion Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Himegoto
description: Nevertheless, if you insist on uncovering their special secrets... consider this your warning. You will meet young women, each with their own hidden mysteries, and soon find yourself drawn into a whirlpool of secrets. Oh, do be careful. In this academy, one must never "pry into secrets."

name: Denpa-tou
description: Sin descripción

name: High School Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: Bad Santa
description: Do puzzles and collect presents all while avoiding the big bad santa. Also watch out for whatever lurks in the basement.

name: Backrooms: Eight Levels
description: "God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you..."

name: Badaboom: Deluxe Edition
description: A match-3 puzzle game with a twist! Play on multiple maps with unique songs — the more marbles you destroy, the faster you advance through the song. Collect bonuses, chain combos and destroy as many marbles as you can!

name: Become an Adventurer
description: Sin descripción

name: Beast Park
description: This is a bullet screen shooting role-playing game, where players can freely match their decks and have a thrilling battle!

name: Battle Shiba Barkade
description: Dive into the Battle Shiba Barkade, a thrilling collection of three unique games, each offering a distinct and exhilarating gaming experience. Free and packed with action, this trio of games is a celebration of creativity and fun, inviting players to embark on diverse adventures!

name: Battle for Desert City
description: Battle for Desert City - is great chance to start your journey into TBS genre in wargame settings and test your skills. Learn to think like real soldier on the battlefield and like general in war room at the same time. Achieve hard, well deserved victory fighting overwhelming enemy forces.

name: Barter & Blades
description: Embark on a medieval odyssey in Barter & Blades! As a budding adventurer, trade goods, shape your reputation, and amass wealth. Engage in dynamic trading, epic quests, and unforeseen events. Are you ready to thrive in the realm?

name: Ball is Life
description: Ball's a well-rounded fellow, but he soon finds himself in an existential crisis. Take Ball on a challenging and hilarious adventure as he jumps across the globe, scouring the round world for round friends who can help him live his best life.

name: Ball Coin Chapter 5
description: Ball Coin is an action-packed Move and Dodge game. Control Rocky, avoid enemies, and collect coins to progress. With three thrilling game modes, aim for the highest score on the leaderboard!

name: Beat the Beats
description: An electric mix of rhythm and boxing game! Use actual boxing-style punches to pound your way through musical arcade levels in hypnotic VR. Get pumped, get moving and beat the beats!

name: Beer Run
description: Beer Run is an Indie game created to steal beers from supermarkets.

name: Before The Mine
description: Witness the recording of a young individual who, in the 90s, decides to delve into a forest in search of a dark secret in this horror game created with Unreal Engine 5

name: Before The Sun Rises
description: Re-growing a dying land with kindred spirits of the forest.

name: Beltmatic
description: Beltmatic is a casual factory game where you combine numbers using mathematical operations.

name: Botanica
description: Botanica is a short 2D side scrolling platformer game that immerses you in a world of sentient plants. Join the sprout, whose kind is often regarded as incredibly weak, on a journey to test its strength against Botanica and its governors.

name: Boom-Shaka-Laka!
description: Boom-Shaka-Laka! - is a modern arena-game with a classic twist. You are a miner. The weapons that matter are bombs. Enemy soldiers are patrolling around. Place bombs with a timer. Collect upgrades. Look for a move to the next level.

name: Bomber Chaos
description: Bomber Chaos is a platformer where the player controls a character who cannot stand still for long, because when the timer expires, an explosion will occur. It is necessary to collect falling explosive barrels and replenish the timer.

name: BocchiField
description: This is a shooter game that parody of BTR(Bocchi the Rock!) Go watch an whole anime, Don't waste your time on this stupid game.

name: BMX Gravel
description: Ready to tear up gravel, get big air and pump out the tricks BMX-style? Easy to learn, but hard to master. Hone your skills and chalk up bigger and bigger numbers the harder and faster you go. So put your pedal to the metal and vie for title of ultimate BMX gravel master!

name: Bluethroot
description: Sin descripción

name: Breached
description: Prepare for an enthralling journey as you step into the mesmerizing voxel art world of "Breached." This roguelite twin-stick shooter seamlessly marries the thrill of rapid-fire combat with the nuanced strategy of rogue-inspired gameplay, creating a gaming experience like no other.

name: Brick Blaster
description: Gather your weapons and blast your way through the bricks in this new twist to the classic brick breaking genre. Test your dexterity and aim as you wreak havoc on waves of defenseless bricks.

name: Bottle of Ghouls
description: RogueLike pirate battles! You are a necromancer spirit who uses your powers to restore your former glory and greatness. Move into enemy ships, board them, use an immortal crew, plunder, destroy and dominate in Bottle of Ghoul.

name: Bot Warzone
description: Bot Warzone brings a remarkable 2D platform shooting experience with a high level of action in a world where its destruction is almost certain. Are you capable of saving humanity? ..I don't think so..

name: Broken Lands: Tower Defense
description: Get ready for an epic journey to defend Broken Lands against hordes of goblins, dwarves, elves and other nasty fiends using a vast arsenal of towers and spells! Fight on deserts, seas, forests and mountains, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations!

name: Bridges & Docks
description: Build the island of your dreams - either by hand or using procedural generation tools. Adjust the quantity of bridges, the maximum height of the terrain - even how close trees are! Meticulously tweak all the configurations to generate uniquely enthralling island worlds!

name: Bunker Protection
description: You are sent to a dangerous bunker, where the last hope of humanity is located - a serum against the virus. Your main goal is to do everything possible to extract the serum and bring it to the surface to save the survivors from the terrible fate of the zombies.

name: Bums
description: Bums is a game with a great variety of mini games where funny and scary. Go through them together with your friends or against them, all to win. The entrance to these worlds lies through cassettes, which are hidden all over the map, and some of them are unique and only a few will be able to find them

name: Bullet Race
description: Dive into the world of "Bullet Race," a low-poly arcade combat car game where wielding powerful weapons is the difference between shadowy evasion and seizing control. Race, combat, and dominate in this adrenaline-fueled thrill ride!

name: Burning Wall
description: The burning wall is behind you and you will not let go, try to reach the exit by showing skill and accumulating wealth.

name: ByteBurst
description: Welcome to the cutting edge of virtual mayhem in "ByteBurst" - the ultimate hacker's playground. Immerse yourself in a thrilling journey through the digital realm, where your skills will be pushed to the limit, and every line of code is a potential weapon.

name: Burning Dead Reloaded
description: Burning Dead Reloaded is a first person shooter on rails that immerses you in the thrilling saga of Mike Pacheco, a former security chief now branded a fugitive. Mike finds himself at the heart of a zombie bio-apocalypse caused by a genome altered using CRISPR technology

name: Chambers
description: Equipped with cunning and agility, you must navigate through a series of intricate chambers filled with traps, deadly adversaries, hidden chambers and mind-bending puzzles. Your quest? to reclaim the gold that was stolen from you!

name: Cats vs. Ghosts
description: Tower Defense: Cats are towers, ghosts are enemies and humans are target. You must put the correct cat to destroy the ghosts.

name: Catty Cathy
description: This is the story of Cathy. She is very catty and always wants to look pretty, but she always says mean things. When she walks she poops and it may turn to gold. She needs the gold to buy fillers for her face to look pretty.

name: Cat Warrior
description: Cat Warrior is an action-platformer of retro and cute style about a cat knight on his way to recapture his stolen treasure. Deep into the dangerous fantasy world,defeat the challenging big boss with your slash, dash, jump, walljump and other skills to find the treasure back!

name: Cavy Chronicles
description: Command an adorable army of guinea pigs in fast-paced tactical combat. Strategically attack to manipulate the flow of battle and outwit clever crab combatants. Develop your forces without tedious grinding. Will you daringly rescue your captured allies or abandon them for the greater good?

name: Cento
description: CENTO is a game where you enter commands in time with music and activate skills to fight. Collect gifts while reinforcing your skills and fight on stages with a wide variety of songs!

name: Cepheus Protocol: Project Fenrir
description: In Cepheus Protocol Project Fenrir, players battle relentless zombie waves as elite Fenrir operatives, mastering Arcade Time Attacks and intense Horde Defense Missions with strategic weaponry and tactics. Dive into exhilarating chaos.

name: Chairs
description: A fast-paced action platformer doubling as the most realistic chair simulator money can buy! Have you ever wondered what your chair thinks? What it believes? What it desires? Learn the answers and destroy some dimensions along the way!

name: Monsters Inc.: Scream Team Training
description:
Disney/Pixar’s Monsters Inc. Scream Team Training CD-ROM recreates the feature film experience for kids ages four and up so younger gamers can delve into activities and games with the characters they like best. Kids play as one of six monsters and Monsters Inc.’s newest employee. Their goal is to be the “Top Scarer” by the end of the game.

Ten challenging activities, each hosted by a different monster and featuring 30 different game levels (for a total of 300 levels!), involve kids in the exciting day-to-day life at Monsters, Inc. As they play, they can even strive to become “Employee of the Day,” Month or Year, an important feat in the Monsters, Inc. world.

name: Off The Rails
description: Hammer the buttons to power the hand car through each treacherous rail road.

name: Chaos Adventure
description: Is there a back story? No... The adventure is yours to make! Pick a character, and you are dropped into the fantasy middle ages to start your journey! This game is designed for you to quickly jump right into it and begin hacking and slashing your way through!

name: Charles: The Full Story
description: Expand 'Charles the Bee' with this DLC! Dive into new marsh and mountain areas, adding 6 extra dance battles and story content. Test your skills in the arcade's triple-threat mode with back-to-back battles. It's a buzzing adventure!

name: Chase Ace Sole Survivor
description: Chase Ace Sole Survivor is a skill-based top-down action arcade space shooter with survivor & roguelite elements. Fight off aggressive alien invaders. Put guns, items, skills and strategy to the test. Survive and rid The Planetary Shield of the alien infestation.

name: Chick Road Rage
description: ChickRoadRage is a Top Down game where the player controls a bunch of chickens one at a time, moving them across the road, floating on logs, and dodging cars

name: Chime Candy
description: Chime Candy is an interactive musical puzzle game that combines the joy of music and learning by guiding fish to their note slots to learn how to read sheet music and various melodies.

name: Choc N Roll
description: It's time to get the ball rolling, but slow down! Be careful what you roll yourself into because too much chocolate can be harmful to you! Prepare to wind down and melt away as you enter the sweet world of Choc N Roll!

name: Chocolatio
description: Create and build your own automated chocolate factory. Freely design and expand your factories to deliver a huge variety of chocolate themed resources.
